taskName1: Find the words in the square. The words can be arranged vertically and horizontally. Direction of the words:  ↓, →
taskName2: Find the words in the square. The words can be arranged vertically and horizontally. Direction of the words: ↓, →, ↑ , ←
taskName3: Find the words in the square. The words can be arranged vertically, horizontally and diagonally. Direction of the words: ↓, →, ↘
taskName4: Find the words in the square. The words can be arranged vertically, horizontally and diagonally. Direction of the words: ↓, →, ↑ , ←, ↘, ↙
